articles.title: People who fled authoritarian regimes say Trump's tactics remind them of home - NPR
articles.description: Politicians, lawyers and journalists who left behind autocratic systems in Europe, Asia and Latin America see the Trump administration employing similar methods.
articles.content: Last year, David Koranyi attended his mother's 70th birthday party back home in Hungary, but the indirect route he took highlights the autocratic rule that grips his homeland. Instead of flying strai… [+7448 chars]
